name: Patta Gobi chole
description: Patta Gobi Chole is a stirfry recipe using cabbage and garbanzo beans.  This vegan main dish is healthy and full of flavor

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, heat the oil on medium heat till hot.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pan, heat the oil on medium heat till hot.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the mustard seeds and let sputter.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the mustard seeds and let sputter.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the cumin seeds, coriander powder, asofetida and turmeric and let roast for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the cumin seeds, coriander powder, asofetida and turmeric and let roast for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the red chilli, bay leaf, serano pepper, ginger and garlic and cook for 3-4 minutes, stirring frequently.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the red chilli, bay leaf, serano pepper, ginger and garlic and cook for 3-4 minutes, stirring frequently.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the strained garbanzo beans and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the strained garbanzo beans and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook covered on medium heat for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook covered on medium heat for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix well again and let cook for another 3 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix well again and let cook for another 3 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the chopped cabbage and salt and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the chopped cabbage and salt and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook on medium low heat, covered for 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook on medium low heat, covered for 10 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Stir it well and check after another 10 minutes if the cabbage is soft enough.
recipeInstructions.name: Stir it well and check after another 10 minutes if the cabbage is soft enough.

recipeInstructions.text: Garnish it with fresh cilantro leaves and serve hot with rotis or naan and a Garlic Papad!
recipeInstructions.name: Garnish it with fresh cilantro leaves and serve hot with rotis or naan and a Garlic Papad!
